Shen buffs garen buffs and nid nerfs?

A good day it is!

Garen and darius should not have been buffed. 
The fact they were is just pure fucked up and a joke.
Best thing is Darius still counters garden :3 {{champion:122}}
Best thing is Darius still counters garden :3 {{champion:122}}
Why nerf {{item:3285}} :(.It's like the only item I get when I'm fed with {{champion:37}}
Ludens echo is nerfed only ON TWISTED TREELINE AND CRYSTAL SCAR BECAUSE THERE IN NO NEEDLESSLY LARGE ROD ON THOSE MAPS.... READ THE PATCH NOTES BEFORE YOU COMPLAINNNNN
can you please nerf {{champion:55}} shes too op and her cooldowns need to be a little bit longer
stfu idiot your just saying to nerf kat because you keep feeding her every game learn to fkin counter her plz
True that :p
Tis' true. I was once a complainer that {{champion:55}} was too OP. Just CC her, you can interrupt her R with any CC spell which literally ruins her entire flow of attack.
debonair {{champion:3}} looks sick af
no
How much more skins does {{champion:17}} need?
FOR EVERYONE COMPLAINING ABOUT THE NERF ON LUDEN'S ECHO IT IS ONLY FOR THE MAPS TWISTED TREELINE AND CRYSTAL SCAR.
that looks like a massive buff to ad fizz, which is bad
{{champion:133}} love confirmed!
Its not love for {{champion:133}} . Its just a bit of improvements for her blind. If anything it helps whoever shes vsing.
Riot thing we could put {{champion:27}} FLing damage back to 260 because his early game is real bad
if your good at him is early game can be strong
thats the good thing about {{champion:27}} becuase after then ememy top has over 100 MR his gas does next to no damage so having the early E damage is good (coming form a 3 year singed main)

Looks like {{champion:86}}'s ult just got...
puts on sunglasses*
URFED
You added Luden's echo as the new 120 ap item... and then reduce its ap down to 100. Good job, Rito. *slow clap*
On twisted treeline and crystal scar...
EpicNomming (slow clap)
To all the Korean League of Legends no lifers out there...DOTA IS BETTER!
made account just to post that... actually enjoy lol now

{{summoner:31}} v

Hey Riot,
Ive thought of this great idea for a new {{champion:80}} skin. It will be called Janitor Pantheon. The cost will be 1350 RP. In this skin Pantheon is a Janitor. For his spear he wields a mop. and his shield is a yellow sign reading "caution wet floor". He is wearing a blue Janitor suit and for his helmet it is a bucket on his head. For his passive when he has the block up the shield will be going around him. When he uses his Q he throws the mop and when it hits it makes a splash. When he W he jumps on them with a splash as well. With his E Its the same the only difference is that it is with the mop not the spear. His ults, he jumps up and when he he lands water and soap goes everywhere in a splash. With his recall he starts to mop the floor around him and then slips and goes to spawning pool. For his joke he says "mop up the mess, oh wait thats my job". For his taunt he says "After I kill you ill have to clean up your mess". For his dance he dances around with the mop and spins around. For his laugh it will remain the same. When he dies he spins around in circles and and falls on the floor. If you do go forward with my idea may I please have the skin for free (Oceania).
Sincerely, Størmrider

I used to play {{champion:18}} as my main adc. Now days? never. 
The only reason I used to play her was because even through she was weak at the beginning, she had potential to grows up to be a late game carry. Now, she's not that weak as before but still not competitive against other adcs other than  probably Vayne. In the late game, she's just an another adc without any distinguishable attributes. I don't really care about her new 'e' skill, just give her back her range and attack speed. Why make her so genuine?
When i'm click accept it just says not responding then i get back in when its like 10 secs left to choose a champ this happend after i patched league
Will OCE be getting these chromas too? I cant see anything about them on here and they are all over NA, just wondering cause they look sick.
is Zac really all that unpopular or difficult to make a new skin for? 'cuz the day when you give Teemo,the King of skins ANOTHER skin,gotta mean somethin right?
They could also make Full Metal {{champion:154}}  with the inspiration on the second terminator from terminator 2 where it show that he is liquid metal.
I agree man. {{champion:154}}  isn't hard to make a skin for considering they had the chance to make pool party {{champion:154}}  as seen in the background of this pic!!!
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Renekton_6.jpg (soz i forgot to add link :s

but seriously there isnt alot of anything u can add to zac

it really is no excuse though... "it's too hard, so we're just not gonna bother"
mate admit it he is a blob and the only difference u can make which will have a huge impact is the colour and the recall of the character.... think about it.
